content.header2: The Go Campaign is our opportunity to engage people who have never meaningfully encountered the good news of Jesus, in new and innovative ways.
content.text1: Jesus commands us to Go and make disciples of all nations. He also commands us to love one another, and the most loving thing we can do is tell people about him in a way that is relevant and meaningful to them.
content.text2: This is our shared vision - to introduce spiritually curious people to the Jesus-centered life through a movement of Jesus-centered churches.
content.text3: When you give to the Go Campaign, you are supporting the projects that fuel our vision - projects that will help us share Jesus in creative, innovative and meaningful ways.
content.text4: To contribute to the Go Campaign, please give to the Go Fund.
content.text5: Thank you for being a part of what God is doing among us.
